mapper.select: select occurrence_time,alarm_id,cellid,boutique_level,limit_times,belong_area,reasons, monitor_content,monitor_value,alerm_level,complete_time from t_performance_work where questionflag = 1 limit 1000
SELECT belong_area FROM t_performance_work GROUP BY belong_area

SELECT occurrence_time,alarm_id,cellid,boutique_level,limit_times,belong_area,reasons, monitor_content,monitor_value,alerm_level,complete_time FROM t_performance_work WHERE occurrence_time > DATE_SUB((SELECT occurrence_time FROM t_performance_work WHERE cellid = #{cellname} ORDER BY occurrence_time DESC LIMIT 1),INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND cellid = #{cellname}

SELECT occurrence_time,alarm_id,cellid,boutique_level,limit_times,belong_area,reasons, monitor_content,monitor_value,alerm_level,complete_time FROM t_performance_work WHERE occurrence_time > DATE_SUB((SELECT occurrence_time FROM t_performance_work WHERE cellid = #{cellname} ORDER BY occurrence_time DESC LIMIT 1),INTERVAL 30 DAY) AND cellid = #{cellname}
mapper.update: update t_performance_work_rt set questionflag = 1 where alarm_id = #{alarm_id}
update t_performance_work_rt set questionflag = 0 where alarm_id = #{alarm_id}
update t_performance_work_rt set questionflag = 2 where alarm_id = #{alarm_id}
mapper.select: select occurrence_time,alarm_id,cellid,boutique_level,limit_times,belong_area,reasons, monitor_content,monitor_value,alerm_level,complete_time from t_performance_work_rt WHERE occurrence_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB((SELECT occurrence_time FROM t_performance_work_rt ORDER BY occurrence_time DESC LIMIT 1),INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND (SELECT occurrence_time FROM t_performance_work_rt ORDER BY occurrence_time DESC LIMIT 1)
